detail_desc: Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and a decorative bow at the waist, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in cotton denim with a high, frill-topped, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt and front pockets. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, lace knit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in a stretch jacquard knit with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Long, wide dress in a cool viscose weave with a slight sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.

5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and button fly with press-studs. Legs with inset embroidered sections and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring waist at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
3/4-length leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Short top in airy, ribbed jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and a twisted detail at the hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and a detachable, soft tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped trim around the neckline, sleeve-ends and hem. Partly lined.
Fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with buttons, patch pockets and a print motif on the front.
Fitted body in jersey with inset lace trims in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Pompom trims at the top and concealed press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Suede shoes with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and straps that cross at the back and have adjustable fasteners at the front. Kangaroo pocket with a print motif and appliqués, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool and cashmere with a faux fur pompom on top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, scalloped edges at the front, lined gusset and string back.
Double-layered hat in soft, patterned jersey.
Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim, tapered legs. Slim Fit.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and cut-out sections with ties at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Dress in airy chiffon with elastication around the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with ties, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

V-neck sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and a racer back. Medium support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Suit trousers in twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with stone-look plastic beads.
Sports socks in fast-drying, breathable functional material with a high, ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
Skirt in two tiers of sequined tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Short V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with cuffs and decorative buttons. Unlined.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, side stripes and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains, one with a coin-shaped pendant and the other with plastic beads. Adjustable length 46-52 cm.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Short, straight-cut coat in a patterned weave with a zip down the front, long sleeves and zipped front pockets with a fake flap. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. High, adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and narrow hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.

Handbag accessory with a metal keyring and carabiner hook, and an imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, imitation leather tassel and a small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 4x11.5x15 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Shirt jacket in a wool blend with a lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top. Side pockets, 3/4-length legs with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Ribbed polo-neck collar in soft cashmere.
Calf-length V-neck dress in soft cotton jersey with thin double shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined at the top.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Fully lined swimsuit with a low-cut back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. High-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with embroidery around the neckline and long sleeves with a small frill trim.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a glittery tulle skirt and a pair of bat wings with a glitter print. Skirt with an elasticated waist. Wings with a metal rim and elastic shoulder straps. Size approx. 22x39 cm.
Hat in a rib knit containing glittery threads with a large faux fur pompom on the top.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, pile-lined tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
